battle_stance.name: Battle Stance
battle_stance.effect: Allows use of Battle stance abilities.

heroic_strike.name: Heroic Strike
heroic_strike.description: A strong attack that increases damage.
heroic_strike.effect: Instant. Adds 45 damage to your next attack.

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: Charges an enemy, generates rage and stuns.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Hurls a fiery ball that burns the enemy.
fireball.effect: Deals 18 to 24 Fire damage, plus 6 over 6 sec.

frostbolt.name: Frostbolt
frostbolt.description: Launches a bolt of frost at the enemy.
frostbolt.effect: Deals 16 to 18 Frost damage and slows movement by 50% for 5 sec.
